wedo_instance.description: Deployment of the Clawed Monster as an AWS TEE wrapper for active lobster instances, securing forensic sovereignty through Nitro Enclaves.

meta.philosophy: The wrapper acts as the 'Claw'â€”a sovereign gatekeeper that clinicalizes external lobster execution within a trusted enclave, ensuring bit-perfect attestation.

tasks.description: Substrate Audit: Verify AWS Nitro Enclave CLI configuration and verify connectivity to the target 'active lobster' endpoint.
Wrapper Scaffolding: Implement the Node.js/V8 orchestration layer that intercepts lobster traffic and signs payloads via ERC-7827.
Enclave Hardening: Generate the Docker-to-EIF (Enclave Image File) conversion script and verify the legislative seals on the runtime.
Attestation Logic: Implement the PCR (Platform Configuration Register) verification to ensure the enclave matches our Heartwood-anchored fingerprint.
Forensic Linkage: Route TEE execution logs into the `hackathons/clawed_monster` forensic timeline for immutable auditing.
Final Realization: Deploy to AWS production and secure the SIS-01 Trinity anchor for the live enclave instance.
